bibl.title: Greek Personal Names. Their Value as Evidence. (Proceedings of the British Academy. 104.)
bibl.note: 9 contributions, constituant les actes d'une rencontre qui s'est tenue à la British Academy le 11 juillet 1998, à l'occasion du 80e anniversaire de P.M. FRASER.
bibl.seg: HORNBLOWER Simon and Elaine MATTHEWS (Edd.), Greek Personal Names. Their Value as Evidence. (Proceedings of the British Academy. 104.)
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2000, 8°, viii-184 pp., 5 tabl., 1 fig., 1 carte. ISBN 0-19-726216-3. £29.99.
